summary: A group of guys are drawn to the same bar in downtown Los Angeles by an ex-girlfriend they all have in common.
cast: Katee Sackhoff|Anthony Michael Hall|Michelle Trachtenberg|Seth Green|Harold Perrineau|William Baldwin|Nora Kirkpatrick|Alix Elizabeth Gitter|Derek Mio|Mario Perez|Dean Testerman|Chad Guerrero|Denny Kirkwood|Adam Daniel|Robert 'Rock' Galotti|Theo Iyer|Paul Cuneo|Katie Costick|Angela Rachelle|Terasa Sciortino|Lauren Fray|Kristy Dowe|Carly Van Skaik|Ford Smith|Brian Tanaka|Nick Longo|Suzanne Eversmeyer|Tricia Williamson|Karen Jean Wu|Ryan Francis|Gage Galotti|Jon Marsch|Katy Poulter
title: Mi genio del mal
